channel.title: Help my commands not work
channel.description: some of my commands: unmute, unipmute, unban, and mute are not working. i am using pr0digidyScape source and client if you can help me or post some working commands then please do thanks anyways. :|

item.title: Help my commands not work
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

ta1nt3d:

post your code for them please?

Ip mute, mute, ipban, ban

[code] if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
            }
        }
        if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights > 1) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(6);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }
        if (command.startsWith("mute") && playerRights > 0) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }
        if (command.startsWith("ipmute") && playerRights > 0) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "mutes2");
		p.muted = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been ip muted by " + playerName);
		sM("You have ip muted "+p.playerName+"");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to ip mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help my commands not work
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Sir Jay:

Um they probably have conditions on them such as && (and) playerRights == (equal to) 2 etc, just make sure you meet these requirements or take them away. If this seems impossible to you then just copy and paste your commands in [.code] tags… here

Or maybe he doesn’t even have the commands in his server

Read full topic
